title: Window Shade And Cornice, 1850–1900
medium: Hand painted on silk, wood cornice
description: Vining floral design typical of Chinese handpainted wallpapers. In foreground, strange rock formation amid grassy plateaus, waterlillies in pond at right, 2 large predatory birds amidst smaller birds, hummingbird and butterflies. Painted in bright polychrome color.

tombstone.epitaph:
Window Shade And Cornice, 1850–1900.
1850–1900. Hand painted on silk, wood cornice. Gift of Eleanor Garnier Hewitt. 1931-40-48.
